message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm asking for $200 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $150 is just a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $175.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $175 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $155?
